> Lamia heard the maximals move away ans she slowly went towards the exit

Outside of the entrance the massive form of Marauder still hung in the
air. the dark shadow of his presence a dark specter covering the
mineshaft that served as an entrance. "Come my minion" said one of
Marauder's twin draconic heads. "Yes." said the other.

Even as he spoke, his huge wings smote the air, holding his form in
the air, his power and ability evident in every beat and thrust."The
time has come for you to leave this place. Your destiny, our destiny
awaits us." The heads said in unison.

(TAG)

*********************

Meanwhile inside the base Legacy stood watching the scanners, his
single optic pulsing calmly. "Fascinating." he said at length as he
adjusted the sensors to sweep over Marauder's form once again.

(TAG)

Preston
(Legacy/Marauder)
